name: You are a Zombie?
description:
You take the place of a Zombie in an apocalypse which has been turned on its head. Humans became mindless, and zombies have to fight for the survival of their own kind.

This is an arcade based game in which you attempt to get a high score. The procedurally generated provide a different challenge every time.

Warning: Blood.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Button - Fire Weapon.

R - Reload Weapon

ESC- End game.

If playing webplayer zoom in to get a better experience since the UI isn't great at low resolution.

If level doesn't load properly press ESC and restart.

This was Originally made for the Ludum dare 33: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=p...

Other Games made by Joseaper:

http://joseaper.itch.io/the-runaway-burger

- The Runaway Burger
